item.title: By: Ben Poole
item.dc:creator: Ben Poole
item.description: <p>Same here. That's the problem with IBM stuff, it's all aimed at corporate types with dev. depts that can spend this money. What about independent coders who just want to learn the stuff? I'm not a contractor or anything, but even I'm in this position. Recently d'loaded the WSAD trial: no idea whether it's time-restricted, but is that an option for learning this stuff?</p>
item.content:encoded: Same here. That’s the problem with IBM stuff, it’s all aimed at corporate types with dev. depts that can spend this money. What about independent coders who just want to learn the stuff? I’m not a contractor or anything, but even I’m in this position. Recently d’loaded the WSAD trial: no idea whether it’s time-restricted, but is that an option for learning this stuff?
